{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-18T22:08:19.000Z", "description": "

Senior Data Scientist

Travel, Leisure & Tourism

$125,00 - $140,000 plus bonus & benefits

Remote (US BASED - EST)

 

THE COMPANY:

An eCommerce company operating in the leisure, travel, and tourism industry is searching for a Senior Data Scientist to join their team. This organization focuses primarily on the travel rewards and benefits subsector. My client has recently entered a high growth period and is looking to scale their analytics division.

 

THE ROLE:

In the role of Senior Data Scientist, you will be responsible for analyzing products and marketing campaigns as well as handling data decision models. This will include managing A/B testing platforms as well as building ranking models and pricing models.

 

YOUR SKILLS AND EXPERIENCES:

The Senior Data Scientist must have:

  • Commercial experience with logistic regression, gradient boosting, and XG Boost
  • Hands-on exercise with using both SQL and Python on a regular basis
  • Previously worked in an eCommerce or customer data-focused environment
  • Ability to multitask, handle several roles with different areas of focus

 

THE BENEFITS:

As a Director of Analytics, you can earn as much as $140,000 per year depending on your experience, as well as several different bonuses, benefits, including unlimited PTO.

 

HOW TO APPLY:

Please register your interest by sending your CV to Andrew Bauersfeld via the Apply link on this page.

 

KEYWORDS:

Senior Data Scientist, Data Scientist, Logistic Regression, Gradient Boost, XG Boost, SQL, Python, eCommerce, Customer, Data, Analysis, Analytics, Travel, Tourism, Leisure, Rewards, Benefits
